languages.text: "Чем ближе чиновник к Вольному Торговцу, тем смелее и безопаснее он себя чувствует. Хочу лишь напомнить, что якшание с ксеносами — ересь, обвинения в которой может избежать только наследник династии фон Валанциус, а не его слуги".

traits.locale_text: "Чем ближе чиновник к Вольному Торговцу, тем смелее и безопаснее он себя чувствует. Хочу лишь напомнить, что якшание с ксеносами — ересь, обвинения в которой может избежать только наследник династии фон Валанциус, а не его слуги".

languages.text: "The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."
languages.original_text: "Чем ближе чиновник к Вольному Торговцу, тем смелее и безопаснее он себя чувствует. Хочу лишь напомнить, что якшание с ксеносами — ересь, обвинения в которой может избежать только наследник династии фон Валанциус, а не его слуги".

traits.locale_text: "The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

"The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

"The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

"The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

"The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

languages.text: “越是接近行商浪人的官员，就越觉得自己安全无虞，胆子也会变得越大。我只想提醒所有人，与异形打交道是异端行为。只有冯·瓦兰修斯家族的继承人有权这么做，{mf|他|她}的仆人没有这个权利。”
languages.original_text: "The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

traits.locale_text: “越是接近行商浪人的官员，就越觉得自己安全无虞，胆子也会变得越大。我只想提醒所有人，与异形打交道是异端行为。只有冯·瓦兰修斯家族的继承人有权这么做，{mf|他|她}的仆人没有这个权利。”

languages.text: «Cuanto más cerca está un funcionario de un Comerciante Independiente, más a salvo y más valiente se siente. Aprovecho para recordar a todos los presentes que la fraternización con xenos es una herejía que solo se puede obviar en el caso de{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de la casa von Valancius y no en el de sus sirvientes».
languages.original_text: "The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

traits.locale_text: «Cuanto más cerca está un funcionario de un Comerciante Independiente, más a salvo y más valiente se siente. Aprovecho para recordar a todos los presentes que la fraternización con xenos es una herejía que solo se puede obviar en el caso de{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de la casa von Valancius y no en el de sus sirvientes».

languages.text: 「官僚は自由開拓者との関係が深まるほど、安心して思い切った行動をとるものです。異種族の肩を持つことは異端行為だと、万人に釘を刺したいのです。その行為を許せるのはフォン・ヴァランシウスの後継のみであり、従者には適用されません」
languages.original_text: "The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

traits.locale_text: 「官僚は自由開拓者との関係が深まるほど、安心して思い切った行動をとるものです。異種族の肩を持つことは異端行為だと、万人に釘を刺したいのです。その行為を許せるのはフォン・ヴァランシウスの後継のみであり、従者には適用されません」

languages.text: "Je näher eine Amtsperson einem Freihändlern steht, desto sicherer fühlt sie sich und desto mutiger wird sie. Ich würde gerne alle daran erinnern, dass ein Schulterschluss mit Xenos als Ketzerei gilt und nur {mf|beim Erben|bei der Erbin} des Hauses von Valancius toleriert werden kann, aber nicht bei {mf|dessen|deren} Dienern."
languages.original_text: "The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

traits.locale_text: "Je näher eine Amtsperson einem Freihändlern steht, desto sicherer fühlt sie sich und desto mutiger wird sie. Ich würde gerne alle daran erinnern, dass ein Schulterschluss mit Xenos als Ketzerei gilt und nur {mf|beim Erben|bei der Erbin}des Hauses von Valancius toleriert werden kann, aber nicht bei {mf|dessen|deren} Dienern."

languages.text: « Plus un officiel est proche d'un libre-marchand, plus il se sent en sécurité et plus il se sent pousser des ailes. Je voudrais juste rappeler que frayer avec les xénos est une hérésie que seul l'{mf|héritier|héritière} von Valancius peut choisir d'ignorer, et pas ses serviteurs. »
languages.original_text: "The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

traits.locale_text: « Plus un officiel est proche d'un libre-marchand, plus il se sent en sécurité et plus il se sent pousser des ailes. Je voudrais juste rappeler que frayer avec les xénos est une hérésie que seul l'{mf|héritier|héritière} von Valancius peut choisir d'ignorer, et pas ses serviteurs. »

languages.text: "Resmî bir görevli, bir Hür Tacir'e ne kadar yakınsa kendini o kadar cesur ve güvende hisseder. Zenolarla yakınlık kurmanın kâfirlik olduğunu ve yalnızca von Valancius vârisi iseniz göz ardı edilebileceğini, onun hizmetkârlarındansanız böyle bir durumun söz konusu olamayacağını hatırlatmak isterim."
languages.original_text: "The closer an official is to a Rogue Trader, the braver and safer they feel. I would just like to remind everyone that rubbing shoulders with xenos is a heresy that can be overlooked only in the case of the von Valancius heir, not {mf|his|her} servant."

traits.locale_text: "Resmî bir görevli, bir Hür Tacir'e ne kadar yakınsa, kendini o kadar cesur ve güvende hisseder.Zenolarla yakınlık kurmanın kâfirlik olduğunu ve yalnızca von Valancius vârisi iseniz göz ardı edilebileceğini, onun hizmetkârlarındansanız böyle bir şey olamayacağını hatırlatmak isterim."
